content: 2 and have remaining in-step stitches on needle 1 k1 ssk knit to last 3 sts k2tog k1 left needle then knit in pattern needle 2 repeat needle 1 remaining in-step top of sock 2 pull working needle back needle out repeat rounds 1 and 2 until 24 28 32 36 sts to create a new working loop at the top/middle of the instep you will repeat round 2 until 12 14 16 20 sts remain now have your 2 loops 1 at the heel and 1 at the top of the in-step cut yarn about 15 long to graft stitches using the kitchener stitch pick up and knit 1 stitch place marker pick up 11 13 15 17 sts along side of the heel flap the slipped sts abbreviations knit to beginning of round-bor bottom of heel k2tog knit 2 stitches together remove bor marker if desired as loop is here to ssk slip first stitch as if to knit slip 2nd stitch as if mark bor to knit slip stitches back to left needle and knit these 2 stitches through the back loops sl1 slip 1 stitch as if to purl instep decreases slm slip marker round 1 knit to 4 sts before marker k2tog k1 p1 s1wyib slip 1 stitch as if to purl with the yarn in slm knit in pattern to next marker slm k1 ssk the back knit to end of round round 2 knit in pattern to end of round repeat rounds 1 & 2 until back to original number of stitches at cast on or to desired number of stitches for the width of foot foot set up knit 12 14 16 18 sts pullout your right back needle to re-organize your stitches so that your needles will now have the sole of your sock on the 1st front needle and pull cord so the instep sts are on the 2nd back needle if you have any questions about this pattern please email us at foot info@atwistofyarn com continue to knit in pattern until 1 ¼ 1 ½ 2 2 ¼ shorter than desired length happy knitting page 2 toe ** make sure that you have an equal number of stitches on both needles **
